titles.title: Ensuring Proper Community Investments Act of 2013
Ensuring Proper Community Investments Act of 2013
To prohibit the sale or trade to another community of community development block grant award amounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: Ensuring Proper Community Investments Act of 2013 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit a metropolitan city, urban county, local government, Indian tribe, or insular area that receives a community development block grant from the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development (HUD), or through a state allocation, from selling, trading, or otherwise transferring all or any portion of such grant to or for any other such entity.
